scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The Herbert Gold collection includes signed typescripts of three undated short stories, two of which are in two versions. All of the short stories include autograph corrections. Stories included are two versions each of "Home in the Dark," [8 and 7 pages] and "Sello" [ca. 1959; 18 and 19 pages] and one version of "A Most Hippest Fella" [14 pages].
